title: Drawing, "Andiron with Griffins and", ca. 1810
medium:
Pen and black ink, gray wash, over black chalk
Support: white laid paper tipped into beige laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown in, lower margin: Chevet, dessin e pour le Prince Belgiojaro..par G. Prati en 1810
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt from the collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource
